#summary Plugin Proof of Concept
#labels Phase-Requirements,Phase-Design

= Introduction =

This proof of concept aims to study the plugin module creation.

= Current Status =

Finished.

= Details =

  * Create a interface class (pure virtual methods) and use Q_DECLARE_INTERFACE.
  * Create a library and add the plugin tag in CONFIG
  * Put the Q_OBJECT and Q_INTERFACES on plugin header class
  * Load the plugins with QPluginLoader
  * Use QDir and qApp->applicationDirPath() to search the path
